events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized as a refund request after reviewing the customer's complaint about receiving the incorrect item.
Support agent Jessica Parker has been assigned to handle the refund case regarding the wrong item received.
Hello! I’m Jessica, I’ll be assisting you today with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Can you please send us a photo of the item you received along with the order confirmation to help process your refund?
Here is the photo of the item I received; it clearly does not match what I ordered. The order number is 123456789.
We have received your photos and verified the error. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and for processing the refund. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund case has been marked as resolved following confirmation that the refund was initiated successfully.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund payment in full. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Closing this case now as the refund has been processed and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
